intro: A cosmic horror comedy, your buddy goes around the world
description:
【Story Mode】
One complete cinematic episode ( x 18 chapters) with a theme of between beauty and ugliness
Use darkly humorous skills to solve difficult social problems in a surreal and comical way.
The story eventually arrives at a forbidden place in the universe, where an epic climax awaits against an ancient demon that manipulates the blood, memories, time, and dimensions of humankind.
・Multiple endings
・Many secret elements
・High difficulty challenge stage

【Character customization】
100 kinds of cats & dogs, and lot of colors to choose from. Dress up cosplay and go on an adventure!
・Player strengthening and development


【Traveling Mode】 (1 ～ 6 min / play, casual rogue-light)
◎<Tourism> (Relax, Exploring, Leisurely Play)
Travel around the world in a relaxed mood, saving animals, searching heartful people and making beautiful souls bloom!
Enjoy the local traditional food and music while thinking about the history of each country.
●<Exorcism> (Exhilarating action battle; Lv.1 ～ Lv.5 High difficulty)
The ego, ignorance, and weakness of the mind that stirs within human beings is clothed in cruelty and attacks as violence! Exorcise the evil that infests society and save the community!

【Festival Mode】 (* bonus content)
■<Board Game>
Become the warden of Purgatory, prevent the escape and invasion of the 12 sinners, and become the guardian gods of the nations of the world (Turn-based x Tower Defense x Cards x Rogue Lite)
◆<Card Deck>
Unlock your favorite cards from over 1,000 cards and create and build your own deck of damage cards by freely dabbling with your own ideas (physical, mental and quantum damage)
▼<City Build>
Become a creative pastry chef in the heavenly realm and feed mankind with delicious and funny civilized sweets and alter the history of the region in a messy way!
